00010 /*
00011  * Matrix types for filter classes
00012  *  Provides the predefined type 'Vec' and a variety of 'Matrix' types
00013  *  Replace this header to substitute alternative matrix support
00014  *
00015  * Everything in namespace Bayes_filter_matrix is intended to support the matrix storage
00016  * and algebra requirements of the library. Therefore the interfaces and implementation is
00017  * not intended to be stable.
00018  */
00019 
00020 /*
00021  * Use the Boost uBLAS Basic Linear Algebra library
00022  * That is boost::numeric::ublas
00023  *  Thanks to Joerg Walter and Mathias Koch for an excellent library!
00024  *
00025  * Gappy matrix support: The macros BAYES_FILTER_(SPARSE/COMPRESSED/COORDINATE) control experimental gappy matrix support
00026  * When enabled the default storage types are replaced with their sparse equivilents
00027  *
00028  * ISSUE: Element proxies.
00029  *  Element proxies have a colourful history!
00030  *  As of Boost 1.30.0 they do not allow assignment of elements between mixed types.
00031  *  They do not work with gcc-3.3. The order of expression temporary distruction overrights previous changes. They must be disabled.
00032  *  The sparse support in Bayes++ does not require element proxies.
00033  *  Define BOOST_UBLAS_NO_ELEMENT_PROXIES to disable them.
00034  */
00035 
00036 #include <boost/version.hpp>
00037 #if !(BOOST_VERSION >= 103000)
00038 #error Requires Boost 1.30.0 or later
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector.hpp>
00042 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00043 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/symmetric.hpp>
00044 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/triangular.hpp>
00045 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/banded.hpp>
00046 #if defined(BAYES_FILTER_SPARSE) || defined(BAYES_FILTER_COMPRESSED) || defined(BAYES_FILTER_COORDINATE)
00047 #include <map>
00048 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector_sparse.hpp>
00049 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix_sparse.hpp>
00050 #define BAYES_FILTER_GAPPY
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 /* Filter Matrix Namespace */
00056 namespace Bayesian_filter_matrix
00057 {
00058                         // Allow use of a local ublas namespace
00059 namespace ublas = boost::numeric::ublas;
00060 
00061 /*
00062  * Declare the value used for ALL linear algebra operations
00063  * Also required as the matrix/vector container value_type
00064  */
00065 typedef double Float;
00066 
00067 /*
00068  * uBlas base types - these will be wrapper to provide the actual vector and matrix types
00069  *  Symmetric types don't appear. They are defined later by adapting these base types
00070  */
00071 namespace detail {
00072                             // Dense types
00073 typedef ublas::vector<Float> BaseDenseVector;
00074 typedef ublas::matrix<Float, ublas::row_major> BaseDenseRowMatrix;
00075 typedef ublas::matrix<Float, ublas::column_major> BaseDenseColMatrix;
00076 typedef ublas::triangular_matrix<Float, ublas::upper, ublas::row_major> BaseDenseUpperTriMatrix;
00077 typedef ublas::triangular_matrix<Float, ublas::lower, ublas::row_major> BaseDenseLowerTriMatrix;
00078 typedef ublas::banded_matrix<Float> BaseDenseDiagMatrix;
00079                             // Sparse types
00080 #if defined(BAYES_FILTER_SPARSE)
00081 typedef ublas::sparse_vector<Float, std::map<std::size_t,Float> > BaseSparseVector;
00082 typedef ublas::sparse_matrix<Float, ublas::row_major, std::map<std::size_t,Float> > BaseSparseRowMatrix;
00083 typedef ublas::sparse_matrix<Float, ublas::column_major, std::map<std::size_t,Float> > BaseSparseColMatrix;
00084                             // OR Compressed types
00085 #elif defined(BAYES_FILTER_COMPRESSED)
00086 typedef ublas::compressed_vector<Float> BaseSparseVector;
00087 typedef ublas::compressed_matrix<Float, ublas::row_major> BaseSparseRowMatrix;
00088 typedef ublas::compressed_matrix<Float, ublas::column_major> BaseSparseColMatrix;
00089                             // OR Coordinate types
00090 #elif defined(BAYES_FILTER_COORDINATE)
00091 typedef ublas::coordinate_vector<Float> BaseSparseVector;
00092 typedef ublas::coordinate_matrix<Float, ublas::row_major> BaseSparseRowMatrix;
00093 typedef ublas::coordinate_matrix<Float, ublas::column_major> BaseSparseColMatrix;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096                             // Default types Dense or Gappy
00097 #ifndef BAYES_FILTER_GAPPY
00098 typedef BaseDenseVector BaseVector;
00099 typedef BaseDenseRowMatrix BaseRowMatrix;
00100 typedef BaseDenseColMatrix BaseColMatrix;
00101 typedef BaseDenseUpperTriMatrix BaseUpperTriMatrix;
00102 typedef BaseDenseLowerTriMatrix BaseLowerTriMatrix;
00103 typedef BaseDenseDiagMatrix BaseDiagMatrix;
00104 #else
00105 typedef BaseSparseVector BaseVector;
00106 typedef BaseSparseRowMatrix BaseRowMatrix;
00107 typedef BaseSparseColMatrix BaseColMatrix;
00108 typedef BaseDenseUpperTriMatrix BaseUpperTriMatrix;     // No sparse triangular or banded
00109 typedef BaseDenseLowerTriMatrix BaseLowerTriMatrix;
00110 typedef BaseDenseDiagMatrix BaseDiagMatrix;
00111 #endif
00112 
00113 }
00114 
00115 }//namespace
00116 
00117 /*
00118  * Common type independant uBlas interface
00119  */
00120 #include "uBLASmatrix.hpp"
